description: The Isle of Man's lockdown restrictions will be relaxed again on 15 June, the chief minister says.
title: Coronavirus: Gatherings of 30 to be allowed in 'new Manx normal'
title_page: Coronavirus: Gatherings of 30 to be allowed in 'new Manx normal' - BBC News
maintext: Health Minister David Ashford said the new guidelines also see visiting restrictions at Noble's Hospital relaxed slightly, with two visitors allowed on compassionate grounds, such as end of life, or one visitor on all other wards.
